algorithms
Class HumanSelector

java.lang.Object
  algorithms.HumanSelector
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISelector, IStrategy, IStrategyLearner, java.io.Serializable
public class HumanSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISelector

A Generic (i.e. available for any problem) Human Player.
This HCI is minimal : you are asked to choose in a list of all possible moves.

Author:
Francesco De Comite (decomite at lifl.fr)
See Also:
